GUIMessage.GetCookiesHandBook:
1. First, log in to your account in the browser.
2. Go to your `Profile` page and click `Likes`.
3. Stay on this page and press `F12` or `Fn+F12` to open Developer Tools.
4. Find and click the `Network` tab in the developer tools.
5. Click the `Fetch/XHR` filter button on the right of the filter bar, and type `like` in the filter input box on the left.
6. Click the filtered item and find the `Cookie` under `Request Headers` in the `Headers` section.
7. Copy the complete Cookie text to the console.
GUIMessage.GetUserScreenNameAndTweetIDHandBook:
1. For `Single User Media`: Enter the alphanumeric username that appears after @, for example if the profile shows `ToxicKCN @2233KCN03`, enter `2233KCN03`.

2. For `Single Tweet Media`: Enter the numeric ID from the end of the tweet share link, for example from `https://x.com/2233kcn03/status/1234567890987654321`, enter `1234567890987654321`.
